sage.scene

Class Model3DTriMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.SceneNode
      • sage.scene.Leaf
        • sage.scene.TriMesh
          • sage.scene.Model3DTriMesh

  • public class Model3DTriMesh
extends TriMesh
    Model3DTriMesh extends TriMesh by incorporating support for model animation data and an associated Texture.
    Author:
    Morgan Darke

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class sage.scene.SceneNode

        SceneNode.CULL_MODE, SceneNode.RENDER_MODE

    • Field Summary

      • loadTexture

        public void loadTexture(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method loads the Texture associated with this model. By default the Texture uses bilinear filtering.
        Parameters:
        gl - An active GL context
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the Texture is unable to be loaded.

      • loadTexture

        public void loadTexture(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl,
                        int minModeFilter,
                        int magModeFilter,
                        int wrapS,
                        int wrapT)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method loads the Texture associated with this model and gives finer control of how the model's Texture is filtered.
        Parameters:
        gl - An active GL context
        minModeFilter - The filtering mode when sampling from LOD > 0
        magModeFilter - The filtering mode when sampling from LOD 0
        wrapS - The address control mode for the S texture coordinate direction
        wrapT - The address control mode for the T texture coordinate direction
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the Texture is unable to be loaded.

      • draw

        public void draw(IRenderer r)
        draw() invokes predraw() for this Leaf, invokes the specified IRenderer to draw the Leaf, then invokes postdraw() for this Leaf.
        Overrides:
        draw in class TriMesh
        Parameters:
        r - - the IRenderer to be used to draw this Leaf.
        See Also:
        TriMesh.predraw(IRenderer), TriMesh.postdraw(IRenderer)

      • predraw

        public boolean predraw(IRenderer r)
        Description copied from class: TriMesh
        This method is called by TriMesh.draw(IRenderer) prior to invoking the renderer to draw this TriMesh; it forces the IRenderer.RENDER_METHOD of the renderer to become IRenderer.RENDER_METHOD.VERTEX_ARRAY. The current IRenderer.RENDER_METHOD of the renderer is saved prior to being changed.

        To suppress this behavior, extend TriMesh and override both predraw() (to do nothing but return true) and postdraw() to do nothing.

        Overrides:
        predraw in class TriMesh
        Parameters:
        r - - the IRenderer which will ultimately be used to draw this Leaf.

      • postdraw

        public void postdraw(IRenderer r)
        Description copied from class: TriMesh
        This method is called by TriMesh.draw(IRenderer) after the call to the renderer's draw() method in TriMesh.draw(IRenderer) returns; it restores the RenderMethod of the renderer to its former (saved) state.

        To suppress this behavior, extend TriMesh and override both predraw() (to do nothing but return true) and postdraw() to do nothing.

        Overrides:
        postdraw in class TriMesh
        Parameters:
        r - - the IRenderer which was used to draw this Leaf.

        Returns:

      • isAnimating

        public boolean isAnimating()
        This method returns true if the Model3DTriMesh is currently in the middle of an animation sequence.
        Returns:
        true if the Model3dTriMesh is currently being animated.

      • stopAnimation

        public void stopAnimation()
        This method stops any animation that is currently happening and resets the animation time.

      • startAnimation

        public void startAnimation(java.lang.String name)
        This method changes the animation sequence that is currently being animated and also resets the animation timer.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the animation sequence

      • startAnimation

        public void startAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                           float time)
        This method changes the animation sequence that is currently being animated and sets the animation timer toa specific point in time.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the animation sequence
        time - The time in seconds from the beginning of the animation sequence

      • updateAnimation

        public void updateAnimation(float delta)
        This method updates the Model3DTriMesh's current animation by first updating the animation time and then by selecting the nearest AnimationKeyFrame. Transformations are then applied to update the model's vertices and normals. In the case that the animation time after applying the delta exceeds the length of the animation sequence, this method will loop the animation sequence.
        Parameters:
        delta - The time in milliseconds to increment the current animation.
